channel.title: Problems putting server online
channel.description: so yea i set the ports on my router its the same one as the tut and i am using no-ip i then made tht port on my router to, i belive the firewall has it as well but to make sure i put it in the right spot i turn it completly off i still get error connecting to server

item.title: Problems putting server online
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Alright so for the portforwarding part you did start port-43594 and end port-43594…
After you do that you need to go to “Allow a program through firewall” or something like this.
Once you have done this, go to add port. Then for port name you type your server ip and for port number type 43594.

Thanks if i helped,
The Soul

Read full topic
